title: Horizontal and vertical speeds of rock

content.question: Which of the following correctly describes the horizontal and vertical speeds and the acceleration of the rock at point Q ?

content.answer: Horizontal Speed Vertical Speed Acceleration v0 cos ùúΩ v0 sin ùúΩ g
